name: The Explorers Land (Name Might Change)
description: The Explorers Land has a Magical Survival experience (Literally magical), set in Medieval times, the game has lots of lands to explore you can run around, you can collect stuff and you can build, more features will be added on but those are some of the main features. Right now the game is in its alpha stage, we are still building the game's core mechanics so in the alpha stage you can't do much.
